Class Slot

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.ui.Slot
public class Slot extends Object
This class defines the view components of a Slot.

  • Constructor Details

    • Slot

      public Slot(int slotIndex, int displayIndex, DisplayMode[] displayModes, String[] scalingModes, Integer[] dpiScalePercentages)
      Constructor for the Slot class.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - - The index of the slot.
      displayIndex - - The index of the display the slot resides in.
      displayModes - - The array of display modes for the slot.
      scalingModes - - The array of scaling modes for the slot.
      dpiScalePercentages - - The array of DPI scale percentages for the slot.
